title: AE插件-ASCII文本乱码艺术视频映射特效 L3tt3rM4pp3r2 V2.7 Win
author: 大众脸
content: L3tt3rM4pp3r是After Effects的文本模式和ASCII艺术视频映射插件，支持GPU加速。L3tt3rM4pp3r2包含重新设计的UI、文本模式预设以及改进的用户控件，内置多种字符集（如VGA、CGA等）预设，无需自行创建纹理即可快速使用。该插件还附带视频教程，帮助用户快速上手。

other.english_description: L3tt3rM4pp3r2 (Lettermapper 2) is the second version of our GPU-accelerated After Effects plugin, allowing you to display video frames as textmode art. Version 2 includes reworked user controls and contains textmode presets (such as VGA and CGA symbol sets and many more) bundled with the plugin, so you don’t necessarily have to start from making your own textures!
other.update_notes: – 调整映射；添加新的字母插值（Cl34rTyp3）
